data.title: Shrimp and more shrimp
data.text: We decided to eat here with a coupon on Sunday.  I used call ahead seating and when we got there there was still a 10-15 min wait.  There were others waiting and we saw many empty tables.  We decided to eat at the bar.  No one was there.  My wife had the shrimp fettuccine and I had the endless shrimp.  Hers was good as usual.  Mine was also good.  I chose the shrimp scampi, shrimp seracha, grilled, deep fried shrimp and peppercorn, parmigiana.  It was all good and fast.  Having a friendly bar tender helped, also.

data.title: Service was great!
data.text: We had the crab legs. Could have been hotter. But everything else was great, especially the service.

data.title: Bad experience
data.text: Looked forward to eating here. Stopped on a Thursday at 6 p.m. 15 minutes wait no problem. Got buzzer and went to bar to get drink. No bartender. Waited 15 minutes. Began to leave and bartender showed up. He took three others orders and filled them. Completely ignored us and began filling restaurant or dress. We then walked out and we think to Outback. Had wonderful service a s food. Will never go to Red Lobster again.

data.title: One of our favorites
data.text: This is one of our favorites. You will leave full. We always have Walt's Favorite. The warm cheese read is fantastic!

data.title: Crabs Crabs and more crabs!
data.text: Just delicious, fresh and great service. Worth the price. Plenty of food: choice of salad, biscuits plus the main dish. Highly recommend it.

data.title: Patti F is THE BEST!
data.text:
I usually keep to local restaurants but went for a friends birthday and we had the best experience with Patti , she made our night! She was a wonderful server and VERY knowledgeable about the seafood. The upgraded crab legs came out looking dry and she immediately mentioned that she wanted to see them cracked open to double check. They were, so she got him another. Then to top it off, she had her manager pick out the best legs he could find and presented them to our friends free of charge! This is what any great server should do to go above and beyond to showcase their restaurant and you don't expect it somewhere like Red Lobster!
THANK YOU PATTI for the wonderful service and great meal!

data.title: Like others.
data.text: Great service at this location. I had the large Alaskan crab, and actually couldn't finish it!  Don't bother ordering corn. Dry and over seasoned. Asparagus side was good. Lobster bisque had some dry lumps of lobster and too much salt.  All in all, though, we enjoyed our meal.

data.title: Great seafood but expect to pay the price
data.text: I stopped into Red lobster last week as I was craving seafood, I ordered the tilapia dinner for about 14 bucks as I was not ready to dish out 30 plus bucks for lobster and crab in Minnesota. The service was ok but there were times when I am waiting for my water glass to be filled as I was out of water, And that is the tell tale sign for me that the service is marginal.

data.title: Great service, but wow...pricier than I remember
data.text: I haven't been to any Red Lobster lately, but we were surprised at the menu changes. Lots of seafood variety for sure, but the prices sure have gone up over the last couple years.  We had the fish & chips (average) and the lobster tacos (very good).  The beer was cold and fresh.  The server was very nice and prompt so overall, it was a very good experience. And those cheese biscuits are addictive. ;-)

data.title: Excellent fish and chips
data.text: I just enjoyed a wonderful fish and chips lunch,  Loved it.  Be sure to try the malt vinegar on  your chips for an extra good taste.  We were served rather quickly as we had a group of 10 people.  Everything was good.

data.title: Rochester's Best For Us
data.text: For us, this restaurant was by far the best restaurant among all the rest of the restaurants that we have been to in Rochester so far. We dined around mid afternoon so there were literally no lines or whatsoever to sit down on our table. Everything was timely and appropriate. Brad was our waiter; he was very attentive and he has an incredible manner with adequate information about the menus so even though we were not very knowledgeable about their menu, he helped us find exactly what we've liked. The service that we received here and the quality of food along with the ambiance of the dining room were all we have found at the end of the day. Quality vs pricing ratio was appropriate as well. We'll plan coming back to Red Lobster at this location every time we have a special event.

data.title: Mayo Visit
data.text:
You can never go wrong at the Red Lobster.
Food and service are consistent at every Red Lobster we've been to. Always try to time get to eat at one whel were need it.

data.title: Famfastic
data.text: Wife and I went as we were in town for surgery at Mayo. Located near the Apache mall it was easy to find. The food and service were both fantastic. We both had the Ultimate Feast everyrhing was wonderful, our server very attentive and courteous. Would definately go again.

data.title: Love this place !!
data.text: Like to treat ourselves once in a while, & this is a treat. Service is always top notch, food is fantastic, reasonable pricing. Nice location with great parking.

data.title: Excellent Food and Service
data.text: Enjoyed the food and staff very well. I wish I could remember the servers name. She was a very nice young girl, she wore a scarf Head band. if that helps at all.

data.title: So many choices!
data.text: Loved all the variety on menu. I am on special low carb diet. And there were a lot of things to choose from. Had the garlic grilled shrimp, it was good, plenty of shrimp, not overcooked. ordered the broccoli and green beans, cooked perfectly for me. Didn't really care for the ends at bottom of bean still being on,  I am not used to eating that, anyway. But overall very good.

data.title: Good food and excellent service!
data.text: Wow, what a surprise!  The service could not have been better and the food was excellent.  I know its a chain, well, they are doing a very good job here in Rochester.  Our waiter, Will, asked what we were looking for then suggested combinations and alternatives.  Good job, thank you.

data.title: The food was very good the service was average
data.text: We had late lunch on a Saturday.  There was no wait to be seated.  My wife had lobster and shrimp I has a bowl of chowder, a fish sandwich and a beer.  The cheddar bay biscuits are a treat, we waited for some time to get a them and we were never offered a refill. The food was very good.  The waiter asked if I needed a second beer several times, but never offered to refill my wife's empty soda glass.   It is an expensive place to eat in Rochester Minnesota, the food was great, the service was average but they did help us out by printing how much a 20% would be on our bill!

data.title: Great fancy dinner
data.text: Always good food and it's always nice to have a fancy meal every so often. The biscuits are always fresh and so is the food. It's hard to choose what to eat.

data.title: Waitress needs training
data.text: Overall, place was clean and staff was friendly.  When I ordered shrimp, I was told it came battered.  When I received it, it was breaded.  I brought this up to the waitress and was told that "this is what we consider batter, rolled in Panko".  I did not eat them and was not offered anything different.  Paid and left dissatisfied.  But I did eat the ceasar salad (which did not come with croutons) and it was very good.  Baked potato was under cooked.
